thread.title: Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long call it quits
thread.title_full: Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long call it quits - CBS News

author: Jackie Willis ET Online
title: Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long call it quits
text:
Another one of Hollywood's "it" couples has called it quits.
ET confirms that Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long have broken up after being together for two years. The newly single Seyfried was all smiles at an Oceana event in Beverly Hills, California on Monday night, and was even spotted by an ET onlooker casually chatting with a man who appeared to be "Newsroom" star Thomas Sadoski. Seyfried and Sadoski starred in the off-Broadway play "The Way We Get By" this past spring.
Watch: Amanda Seyfried chops off her hair for Locks of Love "She seemed really happy and having a great time," said an onlooker at the event. "Seyfried certainly didn't seem upset."
28 Photos Splits Breaking up is hard to do, especially when you're in the public eye
Us Weekly was the first to report the split, and a source close to couple told the magazine that Long is "really heartbroken."
During an interview in the June 2015 issue of Vogue magazine, Seyfried revealed how she hit on Long after becoming a fan of his social media posts.
"I followed him on Instagram, and I thought something he said was really funny," she recalled. "It was a beautiful picture of a snail, and the caption said, 'F**king M VE.' It made me laugh out loud, so I texted him."
Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long have called it quits.
Instagram Back then, she told the magazine that their relationship "just feels right."
Watch: Former "Big Love" c o-stars Aaron Paul and Amanda Seyfried party with Pittsburgh "I really do have my own identity, both inside and outside the relationship, if that makes any sense," she explained.
More: Justin Long hums "Shake It Off," survives being laughed at by Taylor Swift She then added, "It's also really good to feel OK being alone."
Watch: Amanda Seyfried says she was only paid 10 percent of what her male co-star made This wouldn't be Seyfried's first public breakup. She had a three-year relationship with her " Mamma Mia!" co-star Dominic Cooper before splitting in 2010. Long, 37, previously dated Kate Mara and Drew Barrymore.
The 29-year-old actress has also expressed her desire to be a mother one day.
"I keep feeling like my eggs are dying off," she told Marie Claire magazine. "I need to get on it. I want a child. Badly. I want to be a mother, badly. That's what I feel. I've been feeling it for like, two years."
